ygData.subject: Re: Darkness Strikes
ygData.msgSnippet: Pacifix ran over to Prowl, calling Slag on the way. Come on Slag. Prowl, how do you feel this should be handled? he asked.

Pacifix ran over to Prowl, calling Slag on the way. "Come on Slag.
Prowl, how do you feel this should be handled?" he asked.
